transcripts.text: So supposing we hit the body with a tremendous, whether it's ultraviolet or just very powerful light.  And I think you said that hasn't been checked, but you're going to test it.  And then I said, supposing you brought the light inside the body, which you can do either through the skin or in some other way.  And I think you said you're going to test that too.  Sounds interesting.  Right.  And then I see the disinfectant.  where it knocks it out in a minute, one minute.  And is there a way we can do something like that by injection inside or almost a cleaning?  You can apply light and heat to cure.  I'm not a doctor, but I'm like a person that has a good you-know-what.
